name: Yakshit Basak
text: I couldn't wipe the grin off my face. The movie was an absolute delight from start to finish. I was blown away by how much I enjoyed it.

name: Zain Srinivasan
text: The movie left me feeling uplifted and inspired.

name: Misha Kapur
text: I was left in awe of the sheer talent on display. The movie was a tour de force of storytelling.

name: Seher Kapur
text: I was moved to tears by the end. It's rare to find a movie that's as visually stunning as it is emotionally resonant, but this one delivered on both fronts. I've already recommended it to all my friends.

name: Amira Buch
text: I was left in awe of the creativity and imagination on display. I was completely captivated from start to finish.
